mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daul.contest_admin ( admin_contest_idx, title, content, contest_s_date, contest_e_date, submit_s_date, submit_e_date, create_user, create_date, del_chk ) VALUES ( #{admin_contest_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{contest_s_date}, #{contest_e_date}, #{submit_s_date}, #{submit_e_date}, #{create_user}, SYSDATE(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT admin_contest_idx, title, content, contest_s_date, contest_e_date, submit_s_date, submit_e_date, create_user, create_date FROM daul.contest_admin WHERE admin_contest_idx = #{admin_contest_idx}

SELECT admin_contest_idx, org_file_name, save_file_name, attach_type, ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM daul.contest_admin_attach WHERE admin_contest_idx = #{admin_contest_idx} AND del_chk = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE daul.contest_admin_attach SET del_chk = 'Y' WHERE save_file_name = #{save_file_name} AND del_chk != 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT user_contest_idx, title, content, create_user, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as create_date, ( SELECT count(*) FROM contest_user_attach b WHERE b.user_contest_idx = a.user_contest_idx ) AS attach_cnt FROM daul.contest_user a WHERE admin_contest_idx = #{admin_contest_idx} AND del_chk = 'N'
SELECT ORG_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM daul.contest_admin_attach WHERE save_file_name = #{idx}

SELECT user_contest_idx as idx, org_file_name, save_file_name, attach_type, ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM daul.contest_user_attach WHERE user_contest_idx = #{user_contest_idx} AND del_chk = 'N'
